bot: Sure, I can help with that. For loans related to tree planting, Give Me Trees Foundation typically covers all costs associated with the planting and maintenance of the trees. Hello! I'm infi. How can I help you today?

It sounds like you might be referring to areas that have already received tree planting efforts and are currently "saturated" with trees. Is that correct?
